channel.title: Comments for Data as a Second Language

item.title: Comment on Particle Filters by Partial Residual Plot - Applied Physics - Data as a Second Language
item.dc:creator: Partial Residual Plot - Applied Physics - Data as a Second Language
item.description: […] Partial Residual Plot is a useful diagnostic tool in multiple regression. It is particularly for assessing whether a non linear term in one or other explanatory variable is needed in the model. […]
item.content:encoded: […] Partial Residual Plot is a useful diagnostic tool in multiple regression. It is particularly for assessing whether a non linear term in one or other explanatory variable is needed in the model. […]
